        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="68753" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="68753" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.02</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="3951">3,951</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="531"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Luna Rossa Ocean </b> by <b>Prada</b> is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. <b>Luna Rossa Ocean </b> was launched in 2021. Luna Rossa Ocean was created by Anne Flipo and Carlos Benaïm. Top notes are Bergamot, Pink Pepper and Artemisia; middle notes are Lavender, Iris, Sage, Suede and Saffron; base notes are Musk, Caramel, Haitian Vetiver and Patchouli. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>"Prada Luna Rossa Ocean is the new masculine fragrance from Prada, built on a conviction that with technology as an extension of humanity, we can push beyond  our  limits,  imagine  beyond  possibility  and  open  new  horizons. The fragrance features a bright cocktail of qualitative citrus combined with a racy duo of lavender and sage to create a clean and fresh halo. This singular leathery heart expresses a second skin effect by exploring a sensual suede and saffron accord and the elegant creaminess of orris notes."</p>

<p>American actor Jake Gyllenhaal fronts the new campaign, shot by Johan Renck.</p>

<p>The fragrance is available as a 50 and 100 ml Eau de Toilette. </p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a                             <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">198</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Weak and boring
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">

                    Candy-like smell

display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.55.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Saffron-55.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Saffron</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.4.jpg" style="width: 4.025rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Musk-4.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Musk</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.85480333137226; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.183.jpg" style="width: 3.05rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Caramel-183.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Caramel</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.81530224448182; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.2.jpg" style="width: 2.85rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Vetiver-2.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Haitian Vetiver</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.80477139066561; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.34.jpg" style="width: 2.8rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Patchouli-34.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Patchouli</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="68753"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='7d11b24f437b2e926bca89ca6011be75165' slotpayload='{"ct":"AU8vRNrR4KgTGWKHsqknnEQVRkK\/6jUK3qLdWYoiWAg2UlzplgUpnpyo7qkbc3xMBKeiQzDcqQqOMF016GNw50kU3ZmuBQ3zoP8KManFNE447rkNf+OuDUyRL74EBjFMvBpXPZ+CHDc\/O9rLrJ35xpDhC\/tyc7Sj174H9qfpytEeN7a40Euqz\/j8B5kvl93YfVIT7uXT6Vfxu0QUrOtQYnMjD0m+UAV99lcbWFZ0P4qX83gj+PxiOuLm1JeCRLhS2KlOr5qpMbzqgnl769irzw7V8DKXP2vJbfdnvBxonud7IGGlgFB3Ey2S3Ztcc677","iv":"47e798395f5a4867efc2ad2c60c39534","s":"96bfab92c997acdd"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2349602" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2349602" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="divineintervation1994"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2280215"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2280215.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="divineintervation1994" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Cherry-Smoke-78578.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78578.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cherry Smoke"title="Cherry Smoke"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2349602ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2349602" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2280215">divineintervation1994</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-15">11/15/24 02:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very interesting, sweet and powdery summer scent. A favorite of the ladies, this one is signature-worthy and beatiful. I dare to call this one powdery-fresh and gourmand because of the appreciated caramel note. If it hadn't been too expensive and had a stronger performance, I'd buy a bottle.<br />
I got about 5 hours of longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2349602"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2349602#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2343559" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2343559" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mklhoh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1862010"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mklhoh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Black-48682.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48682.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna Rossa Black"title="Luna Rossa Black"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2343559ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2343559" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1862010">Mklhoh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-09">11/09/24 14:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im going to be real about this fragrance. IT SMELLS AMAZING.<br />
<br />
I must say though, it smells like you walked into Nordstrom, Sephora, Ulta Beauty and etc. It really extremely gives off that smell and vibe like you just walked into places like Macy's, Norstrom, Ulta, and Sephora. It smell like a mall. <br />
<br />
<br />
Scent profile is very clean, fresh, powdery, and vanilla.   It is fresh and powdery.<br />
<br />
It smells like kind of like the epitome of designer colognes.  Not saying its generic, I say it smell like the epitome of designer cologne because it smell very high quality.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2343559"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2343559#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2331378" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2331378" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ALakota"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1565541"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1565541.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ALakota" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66826.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Most Wanted"title="The Most Wanted"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2331378ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2331378" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1565541">ALakota</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-29">10/29/24 08:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Definitely underrated at around a 4.02 as of right now. One of my favorite blue scents for sure, and loved more by women on a man than by men from what I can gather which might explain the weak score. Definitely a bit aquatic and green, but mostly floral. I am unqualified to pick out the floral notes in here, but to my nose, it reminds me a LOT of Monte Blanc Individuel only much much more pleasant. That perfume I have, and have smelled it many times but almost never wore it, because to me it has a heaviness and maybe a sweetness that I found disgusting in such a floral fragrance. Prada LRO takes that floral profile (not just vibe, to me it smells very much like Individuel) and properly balances it in its proper place. I think it is a fantastic option, especially for beginners lost in a sea of blue and fresh scents, just keep in mind that it is comes off much more on the floral side to me, as opposed to the more piercing, shower gel style of Sauvage. If you want to go that route, Prada LR Carbon is one that is superior to Sauvage in that department and is almost a dead ringer. My nose isn't the greatest ever, but I can barely (I mean barely) tell them apart. Only enough to know that most people will appreciate the nature of Carbon's ambroxan to Sauvage's, which many people also say. The performance of Ocean EDT isn't epic, but it is in line with most freshies. A good 5 hours moderately with a few sprays. Adjust your sprays to your needs, not a big deal.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2331378"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2331378#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2326185" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2309717"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2309717#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2308144" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2308144" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Blessed_U"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2226682"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2226682.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Blessed_U" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2308144ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2308144" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2226682">Blessed_U</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-07">10/07/24 14:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Having tried this perfume. Some have already written about it and I would also like to write that this perfume is very similar to Versace Dylan Blue. As a person who prefers soft and sweet perfumes, I did not appreciate it, so for the price of 100 euros for 100 ml, I would prefer to buy Dylan Blue. As for me, this composition is overdone with pepper, so the aroma is unlikely to suit very hot weather. In my opinion, this is a 5/10 scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2308144"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2308144#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2307755" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2307755" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Youngkilla3000"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1499531"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Youngkilla3000" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2307755ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2307755" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1499531">Youngkilla3000</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-07">10/07/24 08:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very generic citrus and musk combination, has been done dozen of times and quite boring, if you already have a few blue fragrance. To those who afraid this will came across too marine/aquatic/salty on ur skin, there is no marine notes at all so don't worry. It just a nice, fresh, shower gel ish type of fragrance that serves it purpose as, a mass pleasing designer fragrance. Performance is mediocre (5 hours of longevity)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2307755"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2307755#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2305116" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Try it at your local store and walk away. The scent will be gone in 1.30 hours. I expect this from a clone, but Prada? Too much Cojone$ to be charging this much.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2287434"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2287434#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2279410" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2279410" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vilim20014"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545396"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vilim20014" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2279410ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2279410" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545396">Vilim20014</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-11">09/11/24 13:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Holyyy fuck this is good. Honestly wonderful. Sweet lavender iris combo. And it's randomly really strong for some reason. It just flows so well, it's so well blended and smells super pleasant and addictive. I don't usually like iris because it has kind of an "upscale/formal" vibe, which I don't like, but I don't get that vibe from this fragrance. It comes across as pretty youthful because it is quite sweet and strong, and the sweetness is coming from a caramel-like note in the background. And it's not a typical blue scent. I don't really get citrus from this, and it's not really oceanic. It's just a sweet aromatic fragrance. And even though it doesn't have a fall vibe, it actually works in cooler weather as well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2279410"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2279410#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2279289" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2279289" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Enock128"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1427254"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1427254.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Enock128" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Armani-Code-Eau-de-Parfum-65581.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65581.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Armani Code Eau de Parfum"title="Armani Code Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2279289ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2279289" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); Similar to Prada l'homme with a sea vibe. But it's not that lasting and few hours max longetivity and hardly can smell anymore so need a respray to last a working day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2275454"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2275454#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2269623" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2266902" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wizkid04"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1286903"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1286903.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="wizkid04" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2266902ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2266902" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2266902"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2266902#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2258443" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2258443" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sandyknows"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2201261"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2201261.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sandyknows" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Ombre-Leather-2018-50239.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50239.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ombré Leather (2018)"title="Ombré Leather (2018)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2258443ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2258443" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2201261">Sandyknows</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-23">08/23/24 09:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love this fragrance. Simple, clean, fresh, and does the job well. The performance reviews on this one are biased. This one last a good 7-10 hours on my skin and projects fairly well for a blue scent. It’s definitely blue and again, I’m not sure what people are smelling when they say this isn’t a blue fragrance. Resembles bleu de Chanel in the opening then it carves out its own path and I might like it more than bleu de Chanel. One things for sure, I’ll have both Luna rossa ocean and bleu de Chanel in my collection for a very long time to come. Again, it’s blue fragrance and works for every season and occasion. The fragrance has enough class to handle dates and work but enough of an interesting smell to be sexy. I highly recommend. Don’t see how you could pick Sauvage or Y over this. But that’s just my taste.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2258443"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2258443#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2249925" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2249925" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragranceAnon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1596915"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1596915.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragranceAnon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49144.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wanted by Night"title="Wanted by Night"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2249925ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2249925" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1596915">FragranceAnon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-15">08/15/24 02:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I first smelled it, I thought it might be too sweet. There's a definite caramel note in there. Fortunately, it blends in with the other notes really well and isn't overly sweet.<br />
<br />
Unlike some others, I do get a little bit of an oceany vibe. It's definitely not a blatant aquatic or anything, but there is something that reminds me of the ocean.<br />
<br />
I'm glad I gave this one a shot. It doesn't perform as bad for me as others have mentioned (just spray more), and I love the way it smells off my skin as it dries down.<br />
<br />
If you enjoy easy-to-like blue scents, this one is worth a shot.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2249925"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2249925#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2249498" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2249498" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jeranium"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2221825"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2221825.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jeranium" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2249498ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2249498" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2221825">Jeranium</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-14">08/14/24 15:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Luna Rossa Ocean has the same heavenly, ethereal, sparkling, &amp; elegant body that Prada L’Homme L’Eau has.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2249498"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2249498#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2248797" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2248797" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tripokaridos"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1809949"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1809949.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tripokaridos" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2248797ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2248797" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1809949">Tripokaridos</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-14">08/14/24 06:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Amazing perfume, easy to wear for all seasons clean a bit sweet and Fresh. Way better than most niche .And it's not Offensive beast mode. It's elegant projects normal and lasts 6 hours  .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2248797"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2248797#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2248211" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2248211" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aldoremus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2099433"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="aldoremus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-Profondo-59532.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59532.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Giò Profondo"title="Acqua di Giò Profondo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2248211ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2248211" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2099433">aldoremus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-13">08/13/24 15:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first I wasn't blown away but damn it gets more compliments than most of my collection. Its very good. The more you wear it the more you like it. And the price is awesome.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2248211"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2248211#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2247805" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2247805" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JusttheFactsMan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1733487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JusttheFactsMan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Le-Parfum-61856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Le Parfum"title="Le Male Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2247805ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2247805" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487">JusttheFactsMan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-13">08/13/24 08:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>#798 in my "Tour de Fragrance"<br />
<br />
Trying out a sample sprayette.<br />
<br />
If you bought Armani Code Parfum you've already taken a cuter girl to this dance, and that scent brought nothing new to the market. The whole Luna Rossa line is indifferent, linear and "me too", to the point where I'd compare it to Azzaro's Chrome scents where everything is barely a variation on the one before and they all smell more or less the same. This Ocean scent is the most complex of the line, but it is a skin scent at light speed and not much of one in an hour. Barely fraiche level performance. And while I try with all my might to like every scent with an iris note, this has the kind of Kool-Aid opening you only get from the worst synthetic bergamot, something you expect in a $15 Middle East fragrance. It screams "cheap!" and makes this scent very hard to like.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2247805"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2247805#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2247441" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2247441" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lasse_korsholm"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1872270"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1872270.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lasse_korsholm" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68753.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna Rossa Ocean "title="Luna Rossa Ocean "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2247441ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2247441" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2227068" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Award winning Perfumer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847082"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Award winning Perfumer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2227068ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2227068" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847082">Award winning Perfumer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-23">07/23/24 10:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love this one! This one gets hate from some but I can assure you that this is a fantastic release from Prada. I highly recommend if you want a nice, pleasant, fresh shower gel type scent with a caramel undertone along with a slight blend of iris. The opening is phenomenal with a very nice, fresh, zesty bergamot and pink pepper combo that is beautiful, breezy, uplifting, and refreshing. Once the mid comes in you begin to notice the light caramel and iris combo that rolls into some musk and light Haitian vetiver in the drydown. Go for the 5 oz bottle on this one and you will get the most bang for your buck.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2227068"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2227068#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2225699" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2225699" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragaddict123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1289934"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1289934.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragaddict123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2225699ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2225699" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); I’ve been avoiding designers like the plague lately <br />
But since I’ve enjoyed luna Rossa carbon I had to give it a chance <br />
And it was a good one <br />
I won’t choose it over carbon but it’s still very good <br />
For a daily wear I’d recommend it for blue fragrance's lovers <br />
I enjoyed testing it but won’t consider buying a bottle since I have carbon which is enough for me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2225699"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2225699#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2225329" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; However after an hour, half an hour it becomes a skin scent. <br />
I can smell something salty, oceanic in the high heat. If you can get for a good price you should definietely check this one out, but it doesen't worth the whole price for sure.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2221366"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2221366#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2220083" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2196011">CoreyPeterson</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-16">07/16/24 07:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Overall I do like the smell, but it heavily reminds me of "Ocean for Men" by bath and body works. With that in mind, It immediately turns me away from this. For the price and overall performance it's sad to say that I'd actually take Ocean for men over this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2220083"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2220083#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2220077" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2220077" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ImKen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1804254"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1804254.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ImKen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-Parfum-92469.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92469.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Neroli Portofino Parfum"title="Neroli Portofino Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2220077ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2220077" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1804254">ImKen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-16">07/16/24 06:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I might have trash this too much. Though, when I bought a small bottle, and tested it for a little while, it grew on me. I like it but not love it. The price you get for this is unjustified, and the performance is weaker than you could imagine. Though, to my skin, it last around 4-6 hours at most, but if you were to buy a Prada Fragrance, just go for the L’Homme, Luna Rossa Carbon, Luna Rossa Sport, and Luna Rossa Black. There is Amber, but it is hard to find nowadays. <br />
<br />
The fragrance itself has a touch of that signature Prada powder that comes from L’Homme or Luna Rossa Sport. It is clean and professional, though the name is misleading not going to lie, I wouldn’t call this ocean. Anyways, once it grew on me, I began to like it but for me, it will never replace Prada L’Homme in terms of clean powdery aroma.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2220077"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2220077#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2211917" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2211917" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="therainman2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2184096"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2184096.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="therainman2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2211917ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2211917" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2184096">therainman2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-08">07/08/24 10:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fantastic smell, with 2 hours of performance which is very disappointing. It is another "blue" versatile fragrance, that IMO just isn`t worth the money. BUT, if you can find the 150ml version for cheap, get it and just overspray &amp; carry a decant, that is the only way to wear this one and enjoy it. Go with at least 10-14 sprays, you can do 50 it wont offend anyone after 15 minutes. <br />
<br />
Smell : 8.5/10<br />
Performance : 4/10<br />
Price : 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2211917"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2211917#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2210003" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1866412">kmakmakma</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-06">07/06/24 09:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like this one. <br />
But after having noticed so many young guys (and even teens) wearing it, I don't reach for it anymore.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2210003"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2210003#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2209902" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2209902" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="victorlimaq"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1543162"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1543162.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="victorlimaq" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2209902ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2209902" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1543162">victorlimaq</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-06">07/06/24 08:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really love this fragrance for what it gives to me. It was love at first sniff when I tested at the airport as I got in love with the fresh opening. Then I tested a couple  of times and got it as soon as possible. <br />
<br />
I love it because is a versatile fragrance you can used on any ocasión that makes you feel fresh and clean. And I enjoy the fragrance from the beginning to the end. The musky/clean vibe dry down on clothes is heaven. Typical of Prada.<br />
<br />
What also like is that is perfect for work as it is smooth and subtle. I can use it almost every day without getting bored or annoyed. But is very easy to get nose blinded with this one. And I understand that for some this may be weak or short in duration<br />
<br />
My Prada Luna Rossa Ocean EDT. It has become my signature on the last year. It’s a personal enjoy for the every day. I’ll keep it in my collection for sure. <br />
<br />
PD.I’ve just get the EDP for night outs or special occasions.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2209902"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2209902#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2207170" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I sprayed 5 times, went outside for 10 mins, when I went back inside couldn’t smell a thing. I asked my sister to see if she could smell it. She was just as confused when she told me no. Said it was very very faint. I’m like actually shocked</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2207170"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2207170#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2206903" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2206903" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="minhoEK3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1525221"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1525221.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="minhoEK3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2206903ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2206903" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);
