Not bad at all i like it better then Prada LHomme. Has nice sillage. 7/10<br />
EDIT: I get the comparisons with YSL MYSLF(definately not the same), but more masculine. Very addictive drydown.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2206903"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2206903#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2205394" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2205394" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="u46esp"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1208359"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1208359.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="u46esp" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Sport-2017-42974.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42974.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Sport 2017"title="Dior Homme Sport 2017"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2205394ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2205394" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1208359">u46esp</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-01">07/01/24 23:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It definitely felt like the genre of modern powdery men's fragrance. Fresh, clean, lavender, soft. Layered with a bit of sweet tonka and "powdery agent" e.g. iris, orange blossom and you got it.<br />
- Prada Ocean<br />
- YSL Myslf<br />
- Armani Code Parfum<br />
<br />
The three felt like they belongs to the same genre &amp; you could almost release it in the same line.<br />
<br />
-------------------<br />
<br />
Edit: After full wearing I think Prada Ocean EDT wins the cake of all three. Code Parfum projects too soft. Myslf, while smell is also great, is not cheap. Ocean have great sillage with more affordable price point for all 3. Another very good summer afternoon work --&gt; date evening transition fragrance. Very good balance on fresh and alluring but leans more toward alluring than fresh. Not recommended for outdoor 90F / 30C summer heat at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2205394"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2205394#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2200214" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2200214" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Explorevienna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2083276"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2083276.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Explorevienna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Yacht-Club-de-Monaco-89729.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89729.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yacht Club de Monaco"title="Yacht Club de Monaco"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2200214ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2200214" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2083276">Explorevienna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-26">06/26/24 12:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In other reviews, people said that it does not last long. But for me, out of many fragrances that i have including torino21, this one really has a good longetivity. This fragrance can be worn to many occasions and in all seasons except winter. It is really versatile. The smell definitely has lots of musk, since there are people that I know who hate musk and who love musk. And this fragrance decides it. If you like the musky sweet-like versatile smells, you should get this fragrance. This was also my first fragrance.<br />
<br />
Smell: 5/5<br />
Longetivity: 4/5<br />
Sillage: 3.5/5<br />
Versatility: 4/5<br />
Price: 4/5<br />
<br />
Overall: 4.3/5.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2200214"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2200214#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2193681" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2193681" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LooksMaxxer69420fragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2165462"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LooksMaxxer69420fragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2193681ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2193681" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2165462">LooksMaxxer69420fragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-19">06/19/24 20:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice fresh clean scent with quite average logetivity and projection, would recommend carrying a decant of it around for reapplication. Great opening and sits really well on my skin, defintely better than when some of my friends have worn it so I would recommend smelling this one in store before purchasing not safe blind buy.<br />
<br />
For what it is though, it really is just another mass appealing, compliment getting blue fragrance, a bit more unique than something like sauvage or ysl y edp but does the same job.<br />
<br />
6-7 sprays recommended.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2193681"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2193681#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2192819" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2192819" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Moyashi04"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1974296"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1974296.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Moyashi04" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2192819ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2192819" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1974296">Moyashi04</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-19">06/19/24 04:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Some people can not detect the "ocean" in this fragrance. I get it, it is not listed in the notes so you had to disagree. But it reminds me of the ocean to be honest. It is pleasent, it could go south if over sprayed though. Nothing crazy, this is just good enough.<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2192819"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2192819#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2192454" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's a great choice for an everyday frag you'd use to run errands with since it isn't offensive. Very fresh bergamot top note, slightly musky with a hint of powder that other Prada frags have. Get it on a discount though</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2189892"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2189892#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2184609" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2184609" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JacobMolen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1627991"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1627991.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JacobMolen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Sauvage-Eau-Forte-95863.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95863.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sauvage Eau Forte"title="Sauvage Eau Forte"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2184609ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2184609" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1627991">JacobMolen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-11">06/11/24 01:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don’t know if I got a poor batch but there’s something in this fragrance smelling like a bad case of BO. You know when you were in your teens and that guy in class who didnt’t shower after gym class borrowed a frag from someone to cover up the smell. I’m getting hints of that. I see some people in the comment section having the same issues. Not counting the BO problem I would say that the fragrance has an interesting sweet and warm touch for an aquatic. But for me, this will probably sit on the shelf for a while before I sell it. Good looking bottle though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2184609"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2184609#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2181624" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Lasts around 4 hours for me. 6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2179904"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2179904#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2178454" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029669">TheFraganist55</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-20">05/20/24 08:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ocean EDT is a solid take on the Prada DNA. It's fresh, woody, somewhat sweet, floral, and musky. The Ocean EDP and Parfum are much more creamier and suited more for cooler weather than this. This is like a smoother and sweeter version of Dylan Blue. Performance is meh though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2161930"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2161930#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2158421" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1835350">Phillyyu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-10">05/10/24 15:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really love the dry down, the aromatic, yet clean, and slightly powdery smell is really great.  It doesn't project that much, but I like how low-key it is.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2152028"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2152028#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2151580" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2151580" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ethan-fragrantica"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1673973"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ethan-fragrantica" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2151580ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2151580" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1673973">ethan-fragrantica</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-10">05/10/24 07:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Luna Rossa Ocean by Prada: <br />
This is a very subtle, clean and powdery fragrance with the typical yet iconic soapiness that many Prada's have. It smells gentle and soft, almost like baby powder meets a bar of fancy handsoap. It's got average performance and longevity and is suitable for all ages day and night. The only time I wouldn't wear this is winter, not because it wouldn't work but because there are better options imo. The name and design are weird though, it seems like it would be an Invictus-y very marine scent but it isn't.<br />
<br />
Top notes: Bergamot, artemesia, soap<br />
Middle notes: Lavender, iris<br />
Base notes: Patchouli, caramel, soft vetiver<br />
<br />
Longevity: 3/5<br />
Sillage: 3/5<br />
Scent: 4.5/5<br />
Design: 5/5<br />
Gender: Masculine<br />
Overall: 5/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2151580"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2151580#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2149484" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2149484" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aounhaddad"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1792173"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="aounhaddad" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2149484ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2149484" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1792173">aounhaddad</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-08">05/08/24 08:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i dont get all the bad reviews on its longevity and silage, with one spray it lasts 6+ hours, and its an all year round yes its citrusy when you first spray it but the dry down is very sweet caramel smell that also works for winter days and nights</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2149484"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2149484#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2148685" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2148685" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Detman101"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1374575"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1374575.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Detman101" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Ishq-Al-Shuyukh-Gold-81121.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81121.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ishq Al Shuyukh Gold"title="Ishq Al Shuyukh Gold"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2148685ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2148685" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1374575">Detman101</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-07">05/07/24 13:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just received a bottle of this in a trade...and WOW!!<br />
This reminds me of "Davidoff - Cool Water"....BUT BETTER!!<br />
Will post review after I wear it tomorrow...<br />
<br />
UPDATE:<br />
This fragrance has something in it that takes me back to my teenage years. Its not the similarity to "Cool Water", but something else. This is the perfect "Anytime" fragrance. Even if you overspray, it doesn't offend. I would wear this before I ever reach for "Dylan Blue" when I head to the office. This has the same "bright-grapefruit" feel.....but smoother!! I'm not sneezing and my nose isn't tickling the way it does with Dylan Blue, which means I don't have to take allergy meds to wear this "P-LRO"!! This is much smoother and comforting than "Bleu de Chanel"...another in my collection that is too sharp for my nose. This is a darker and smoother version of "Armaf - The Pride"...just without the longevity. This frag is definitely in "Signature Scent" territory....wow.<br />
<br />
So far, I absolutely LOVE this fragrance!! <br />
It smells great and the fact that I got it in a trade works out GREAT!<br />
Compared to all of my other "Blue" frags....this one is SO MUCH MORE WEARABLE!! I've found and bought a clone of it and I've bought a backup bottle additionally while saving up for the EDP version next. <br />
I'm going to be wearing this daily for a loooooooong time!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2148685"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2148685#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2147233" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2147233" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="daclevan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1799829"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="daclevan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2147233ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2147233" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1799829">daclevan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-06">05/06/24 05:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like this one a lot. Lately, when I wear it, I smell the citrus/pepper/vetiver notes the most. I agree with a lot of people that this isn’t a very oceanic scent in the sense that I don’t get any marine accords. I perceive this as a very fresh and clean scent. It comes off as masculine, and isn’t quite as soapy or powdery as other Prada Luna Rossa fragrances (I’ve tried Black, Carbon, and the original). <br />
<br />
To me, this is an easy reach for spring or summer, day or night. I think it works fine for anytime where I’ll be outside because it isn’t too cloying. That said, I do find the performance to be a bit lacking— projects decently for maybe an hour or two, then becomes mostly a skin scent to me. <br />
<br />
This has become my dumb reach for spring/summer 24. Pretty bottle too. 8.4/10- could be higher, but the performance being only decent to below average knock it down a few pegs for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; It's flowery. It's aquatic. Fresh and citrusy, which I usually like. Reminds me of something like Davidoff's Cool Water with a more modern twist, or maybe some other summer cheapie from my collection.<br />
I could give it a longer try, but comparing it's price tag to the fragrances it reminds me of, it's overpriced.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2140678"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2140678#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2138668" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I still have a full bottle I am trying to sell, if anyone is interested, please DM on instagram! Username is @_ry508</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2138668"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2138668#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2138284" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2138284" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scroub"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1801914"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1801914.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scroub" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/La-Nuit-de-L-Homme-Bleu-Electrique-67997.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67997.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Nuit de L'Homme Bleu Électrique"title="La Nuit de L'Homme Bleu Électrique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2138284ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2138284" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1801914">Scroub</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-27">04/27/24 13:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells very "generic male fragrance" to me. It's ok, it's soft, it has a little metallic (kind of aquatic) edge. It's good enough. Just not something I really like. I don't want to smell like that. 6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2138284"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2138284#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2137837" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2137837" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nerdboy83"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1753665"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1753665.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nerdboy83" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2137837ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2137837" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1753665">Nerdboy83</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-27">04/27/24 05:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A nice casual, playful, soft, calm, inviting oceanic fragrance that was beautifully blended. This aroma have that "Gentleman Aura" touch to it. This doesn't smell unisex or Macho Man-ish. Nothing really groundbreaking about this. This is not a crowded pleaser or an attention grabber. This is great for smelling nice without being offensive or getting noticed. You can still receive compliments from this. And if you don't receive any, women will stand more closer to you than usual and look in your direction as well. This fragrance smell modern (Nothing vintage about it)<br />
<br />
The longevity is fair. I usually layer my cologne with essential oils that are inspired by the fragrance itself to get the performance that I truly desire without having to keep overspraying myself. <br />
<br />
I would only reach for this. <br />
<br />
1)Spring/Summer.<br />
2)Daytime. <br />
3)Gym.<br />
4)Running errands. <br />
5)Job/Office. <br />
6)Outdoor activities. <br />
7)Warm sunny or damped rainy days. <br />
8)Happy Hour. <br />
9)Dressing casual <br />
<br />
I wouldn't necessarily reach for this. <br />
<br />
1)Hanging with the fellas. <br />
2)Attending a formal event. <br />
3)Dressing down or sophisticated. <br />
4)Fall/Winter. <br />
5)Nights/Evenings. <br />
6)Clubbing/Party Atmosphere.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2137837"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2137837#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2137250" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1890008">Mitzii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-26">04/26/24 12:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bought this along with Prada Luna Rossa Black after hearing mixed reviews. Both of them are great, this one really reminds me of a mix between Prada Luna Rossa Carbon and Versace Dylan blue, I love it. I do prefer Prada Black though as it just smells much more complex, and the scent is just the style I'm looking for in my collection, however if you just want a sexy, woody, fresh everyday fragrance that performs decent, this is a good option. 7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2135832" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Winther"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1650306"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1650306.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Winther" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-Parfum-49912.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49912.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel Parfum"title="Bleu de Chanel Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2135832ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2135832" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1650306">Winther</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-25">04/25/24 06:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another blue scent from one of the big houses. It’s nothing groundbreaking for sure, but it combines many of the best elements of other blue fragrances to become one of the best. To me it has a similarly to Dylan blue while having the class and sophistication of Bleu de Chanel. My second favorite designer blue fragrance after bdc parfum, this is more versatile tho.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2135832"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2135832#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2135610" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2135610" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WildCalifornia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="WildCalifornia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2135610ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2135610" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447">WildCalifornia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-25">04/25/24 00:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Did not like this . The top notes didn't last long. To me it sunk into the base notes pretty fast.  To me it went to vetiver , iris, patchouli and some caramel pretty fast. It's a really smooth fragrance. It's does keep getting better the longer you wear it  but I'm not a big fan of patchouli. Which is a dominant note. <br />
Performance isn't bad. It projected pretty well for 2 hours . And didn't becomes a very close skin scent until about the 5th hour. <br />
Scent - 7.0<br />
Complexity - 6.0 <br />
Performance - 8.0<br />
Bottle - 9.0</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2135610"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2135610#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2131362" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2131362" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Psalzarulo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723203"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Psalzarulo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2131362ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2131362" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723203">Psalzarulo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-21">04/21/24 07:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has been one of my favorite scents for a while now and I've somehow forgotten to review it. This is really the scent that got me into the the entire Prada line. <br />
<br />
This brings the clean, fresh lavender notes that Prada does so well, especially with the Luna Rossa line. It adds bright citrus and sweet caramel and musk base-notes to give it a "blue" feeling, but it's really not similar to any blue scents I've been able to smell. If you've like me and you love the Luna Rossa DNA, you'll probably love this too. It's sweeter than the OG and some of the other flankers, but still extremely clean and gives a very confident, masculine appeal.<br />
<br />
Obviously if you don't like soapy, lavender scents you'll want to try this on before buying it, but I would say this is not quote as soapy as other Prada scents, as it leans more towards sweet. <br />
<br />
This is a really versatile scent, wearable any pretty much any occasion. I would definitely see myself wearing this on a warm summer day.<br />
<br />
This is just an amazing scent overall. The only downside to me would be the longevity can be somewhat weak. 9.5/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2131362"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2131362#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2129032" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Again I cannot recommend as it is mine and mine only</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2121754"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2121754#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2118696" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2118696" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dorde"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1896798"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1896798.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dorde" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2118696ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2118696" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1896798">Dorde</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-08">04/08/24 18:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Prada Luna Rossa Ocean,<br />
i like it,for me it's all about drydown,love the iris and lavender combo and that<br />
powdery feel.The opening is kind a weird,very unussuall,like ocean,wtf,<br />
like you expected something different from its name.But there is some magic...<br />
Then it sit down like a cozy glove around you.And yes,you feel quality<br />
ingredients very well blended together.Very clean and safe scent,nothing<br />
special,but enough to get you smile and confidence in every situation.<br />
Not a really typical blue fragrance,more on its own way.<br />
I buy it and don't regret at all.<br />
I smell edp but i buy edt.It is lighter and more casual then edp.<br />
So from me strong 8,5/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2118696"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2118696#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2118330" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2093423" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kojii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044330"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2044330.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kojii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Uomo-Born-In-Roma-Coral-Fantasy-71761.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71761.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Coral Fantasy"title="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Coral Fantasy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2093423ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2093423" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044330">kojii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-15">03/15/24 09:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love both this one and the EDP, this one I like more though. It's one of my warm weather go to colognes. Imagine clean laundry soapiness with some caramel and the tiniest bit of freshness. Smells the same from start to finish. Projection is surprisingly decent off my skin, performance is pretty solid as well, 7+ hours. Overall a good safe fragrance and what I wear to any outing where I want something high quality and SUPER safe (Interviews, dinner with a group, visit to grandma's, any event where it's very important to make a good first impression, etc.). Not overly masculine (but FAR from feminine) and very youthful. If you're looking for a pleasant and crowd pleasing clean scent that can pull lots of compliments, this is for you. If you're 20+, I'd suggest Y EDP Intense as it's an amazing mature blue fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2093423"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2093423#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2091980" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2091980" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="danielenachem"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1174964"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1174964.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="danielenachem" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/A-Men-705.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.705.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A*Men"title="A*Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2091980ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2091980" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); It’s a bit lighter and soapy rather than woodsy and spicy. Nice everyday scent..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2091980"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2091980#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2089133" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2089133" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DesignersOnly93"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1665133"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1665133.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DesignersOnly93" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/Light-Blue-Forever-pour-Homme-66556.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66556.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Light Blue Forever pour Homme"title="Light Blue Forever pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2089133ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2089133" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1665133">DesignersOnly93</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-11">03/11/24 09:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beauty of this fragrance is when it becomes a skin scent, when you can detect the aromatic fougere in LR Ocean. Unfortunate.<br />
<br />
Opening has a weird "grape soda" smell. Late drydown as a skin scent smells 90% close to Nivea active clean shower gel.<br />
<br />
Nivea active clean shower gel smells absolutely amazing. Raw masculinity. Charcoal vanilla bourbon shower gel smell, with elemi and orris. If one of these fragrance houses could replicate the smell identically....<br />
<br />
Would be a #1 seller in men's fragrances. Sauvage would have to move aside.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2089133"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2089133#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2087723" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
This fragrance isn't tailored to a specific age range. <br />
<br />

<br />
I swear fragcom is full of arbitrary rules and nonsensical noise</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2081348"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2081348#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2077037" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2077037" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="n&iacute;simaldar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1548982"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="n&iacute;simaldar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Rehab/Superman-20125.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20125.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Superman"title="Superman"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2077037ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2077037" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1548982">n&iacute;simaldar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-28">02/28/24 13:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like caramel coated laundry sheets. In short, a weird mash up of sweet and clean/aromatic that just doesn't work for me. I think if the caramel was dropped from the lead into a supporting role, I could like it more. But sadly, like the Y line, this is just too sweet for me. I almost never reach for my 2ml decant even after having it for a year. Too sweet for work, too cloying for the gym, too soapy for dates. Overall, a very youthful scent. Maybe ideal for you're 17-21 year olds and going out at night. <br />
<br />
When I want sweet Prada, I gravitate to Amber Pour Homme Intense or Prada L'Homme Intense. Two great scents that are sweet and yet still masculine and mature.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2077037"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2077037#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2067578" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Keeps that fresh out of the shower scent in all notes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2067578"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2067578#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2067032" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2067032" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bdgarver"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1834547"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="bdgarver" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Banana-Republic/Cypress-Cedar-50227.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50227.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cypress Cedar"title="Cypress Cedar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2067032ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2067032" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1834547">bdgarver</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-19">02/19/24 07:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like new car scented air freshener mixed with shower gel. Also reminds me of a shoe store smell.  It’s actually quite nice and modern smelling and not just a run of the mill blue fragrance.  The more I wear the more I like it.  It’s a touch barbershop but the caramel and the suede keep it from going too far in that direction.  Not very aquatic smelling at all but does have a nice musk.  Lasts about 6 hours on skin with soft projection for 2 of them so it’s not that strong but feels clean and a little unique. Could wear about anywhere anytime.  It’s very non offensive and clean with some depth in its notes. <br />
Solid semi freshy 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2067032"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2067032#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2064666" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2064666" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SailorMars657"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/841257"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.841257.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SailorMars657" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2064666ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2064666" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/841257">SailorMars657</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-16">02/16/24 18:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So I’ve been putting off trying Prada Luna Ocean for awhile because I heard despite the name, it’s not an aquatic scent. I figured I don’t need another “office” type scent in my collection. Welp, I finally tried it and was surprisingly impressed! It’s true, it’s not an aquatic summer time scent but this is even more versatile and can be day or night dressed up or dressed down. It’s just the perfect balance of clean, sweet and fresh. It had medium silage and projection but great longevity for an EDT. I give this one an A plus, I will try for Luna Rosa EDP next and report back.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2064666"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2064666#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2063548" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2063548" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stardust_ziggy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1701040"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1701040.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stardust_ziggy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Reflection-Man-920.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.920.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Reflection Man"title="Reflection Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2063548ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2063548" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1701040">stardust_ziggy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-15">02/15/24 16:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am probably smelling things but this is similar to Bleu de Chanel to me. Not so much when I compare one wrist vs the other but this reminds me of it in general…but better. And that’s no deference to BDC but this is pretty dang good. <br />
<br />
It’s like a scent that say you normally like things buttoned up and versatile yet opulent this is that but letting you let loose a little more with a fun “bluish” scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2060656" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Muskyflower"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740743"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Muskyflower" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2060656ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2060656" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);
