<br />
6 sprays this morning around 9 am. <br />
<br />
Didn't get home until around 9:30 pm and my daughters were dangling off my arms talking about "you smell good daddy." And then proceeded to sniff me for like 5 minutes lol. <br />
<br />
Longevity is fine. <br />
Is it a projection beast? nah. <br />
But who cares, <br />
I can smell this on me literally all day and it is amazing, comfortable, easy to wear and it makes me happy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2060656"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2060656#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2058503" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2058503" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="samudex"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1627487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1627487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="samudex" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Ra-ed-Silver-75900.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75900.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ra'ed Silver"title="Ra'ed Silver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2058503ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2058503" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1627487">samudex</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-10">02/10/24 17:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is citrus, marine, fresh. It is very pleasant but due to the type of notes it does not last long, after 2 or 3 hours you can feel it close to skin. I compare it to Versace Pour Homme, but more modern. It is halfway between cologne and blue fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2058503"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2058503#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2050291" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2050291" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ScentNSent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587762"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ScentNSent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2050291ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2050291" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587762">ScentNSent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-02">02/02/24 14:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First things first, I believe this is criminally underrated and I think I know why. The name “ocean” definitely throws people off, I don’t think this is the typical “blue” fragrance people expected when they bought it. That being said I still think it’s a great fragrance, it has this creamy kinda smell to it, definitely a bit musky, aromatic &amp; slightly powdery, in my opinion doesn’t really fall into the Luna Rossa line. But I love the scent regardless, doesn’t smell cheap, and pretty unique if you ask me, doesn’t exactly smell like anything else I own. Definitely a good buy IMO but try before you buy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2050291"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2050291#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2047695" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2047695" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Milestone87"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1276861"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Milestone87" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Armaf/Club-de-Nuit-Man-27687.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.27687.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Club de Nuit Man"title="Club de Nuit Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2047695ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2047695" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1276861">Milestone87</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-31">01/31/24 07:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>has the same dna like lunrosse carbon, but its his own thing. and its Beautiful, like to wear it. its for any situiation.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2047695"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2047695#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2041680" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2041680" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thelastpharaoh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496459"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="thelastpharaoh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Issey-Miyake/Nuit-d-Issey-Polaris-61305.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61305.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nuit d'Issey Polaris"title="Nuit d'Issey Polaris"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2041680ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2041680" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496459">thelastpharaoh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-25">01/25/24 10:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very good fragrance. Should be rated higher. I get a lot of compliments wearing this. It annoys me because I have some niche faves that I'm dying to get compliments on, but no, it's this one every time. <br />
<br />
Reading reviews below it's funny to see how some people think it doesn't smell like the ocean at all and others think it smells too blue. But imo that actually shows the uniqueness of this fragrance. It's a bit of a chameleon. How it smells to you probably has to do with the last scent you smelled. Next to blue scents it is not very blue, more aromatic, fresh and powdery. Next to sweet scents it smells like the ocean, saltiness and all. The herbal and caramel notes are very cool and make this more interesting than a standard blue fragrance (which are usually heavily citrus throughout and some amber or wood in the base). <br />
<br />
I couldn't see anyone saying this smells bad. Sure it may not be for you, but that doesn't mean it's bad. Imo this is an example of a designer fragrance done right. The only caveat I would add here is that it smells like 'Prada'. It smells a bit posh. Classy, a bit soapy. Definitely clean. If you're the type of guy who likes a bit of grunge, or swagger, or roughness...this probably won't be your vibe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2041680"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2041680#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2038257" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2038257" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="solulszabolcs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1938205"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="solulszabolcs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2038257ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2038257" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1938205">solulszabolcs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-22">01/22/24 04:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very pleasant scent. For any occasion. I could recommend it to almost everyone who likes Parda fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2038257"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2038257#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2037527" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2037527" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DapperDon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1614689"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="DapperDon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5674.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Endymion"title="Endymion"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2037527ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2037527" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1614689">DapperDon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-21">01/21/24 10:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’m sorry, but.. Basic bitch generic blue shower gel fragrance. Smells like every mainstream, mass appeal, sweet, boy designer release since fruit-loops became popular for men to wear.<br />
Opens with Dylan Blue, YSL Y &amp; Invictus type vibes. remains very juvenile throughout. Which is fine &amp; obviously what they were going for. Just how I personally feel. Best suited for 10-28 yr olds.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2037527"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2037527#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2037421" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2037421" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragrance Notes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1975254"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1975254.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragrance Notes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2037421ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2037421" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1975254">Fragrance Notes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-21">01/21/24 08:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First day wearing my new bottle and I am sitting here feeling gooood. I don’t know yet if this is my new favorite but, it is definitely going to make my decision harder. The Bergamot off the top mixes so well with the Pink Pepper..there is no harshness to this at all at first spray. So smooth so easy to wear. The florals in the middle are not feminine to me at all…still keeps this scent feeling manly and smooth especially with a hint of that Iris making that Prada does so well. And that dry down leading to a nice warm bottom really brings this fragrance together perfectly for me. <br />
<br />
Try this on skin. Wear it a while. To me, this is not a generic fragrance…it has some similarities to a degree with others but it has about a 7/10 in uniqueness which is hard to find these days. I give this a 9.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2037421"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2037421#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2035951" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
(Basically it reminds me of how old men smell when they drink too much and sweat it out.)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2024511"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2024511#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2022119" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2022119" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CHRISTIANDIORDIOR"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1930654"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="CHRISTIANDIORDIOR" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2022119ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2022119" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1930654">CHRISTIANDIORDIOR</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-06">01/06/24 03:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First cologne I've ever worn where I not only got not one compliment, I had family members asking why I smelled so bad and suggesting I take a shower. Maybe the sampler I got due to interest was from a bad batch, but this really just smells like an armpit to me.<br />
<br />
If you like this smell, go for it, but DO NOT BLIND BUY, and I wouldn't get it as a signature because people will hate it.<br />
<br />
I find it unique at least, so in a huge collection it could be an interesting addition, and the bottle is nice. Silage is strong, but in this case I don't think that's a good thing if you want your loved ones to not puke or faint.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2022119"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2022119#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2021334" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2021334" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xFragrantica"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1910528"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="xFragrantica" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2021334ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2021334" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1910528">xFragrantica</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-05">01/05/24 10:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Your basic common freshy, used as a dumb reach.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2021334"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2021334#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2021038" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2021038" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MyBreedIsParfum&eacute;"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1897132"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1897132.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MyBreedIsParfum&eacute;" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2021038ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2021038" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1897132">MyBreedIsParfum&eacute;</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-05">01/05/24 05:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm not a big fan of designer fragrances as sometimes they're just the next "revenue" aroma. <br />
Prada Luna Rossa Ocean is something I really like, it opens very fresh and clean, a very different and surprising fresh smell compared to other freshy perfumes that's why I liked it and bought it, the dry down starts after 10-15 minutes passing from the iris and lavender which gives it the sweet syrup taste and after 0.5-1 hour moves to the aromatic musk.<br />
I agree about the weak longevity and sillage, but this fragrance is not boring and it's something worth trying.<br />
<br />
A lot of people don't understand the "Ocean" in it, but it's named more after the design of the bottle, rather than the scent. I've mistakenly bought EDP from the airport, which is a lot more sweet and the opening grapefruit/frankincense smell for me is unpleasent but as always this depends on personal taste.<br />
<br />
Overall 8/10 .To all of you that want the smell to be more potent and strong, just accept it as it is and don't spare sprays - you know the EDT concentration is less, so just spray 5-10 times and the longevity is secured at least 3-4h on 1m around you and then it become a skin scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2021038"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2021038#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2018441" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
5 spray : 3 around your neck , 2 on both arms u good to go</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2018441"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2018441#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2015801" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I collect Prada. I have backup bottles of several of my Prada colognes, I love them so much. Unfortunately, Luna Rossa Ocean is a miss for me. It has the clean, powdery Prada d.n.a. that we all know and love, but there's a sweet, cheap bubblegum/candy note in it that just won't settle down. I've tried it several times, because I want to like it, but it's just not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2015801"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2015801#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2013374" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smells like a fresh deodorant, nothing special. Also, the performances are not that great.<br />
Bdc edt has a better smell and quality, Dylan Blue is more interesting, Sauvage edt-another deodorant type of a smell with better performances. So why should you buy it?<br />
Prada Carbon, Black, Ocean edp are better options from this line.<br />
On a scale from 1 to 10 i'll give a 6.75</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2013374"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2013374#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2011988" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It smells good and that’s pretty much it. Great everyday scent for work, I can’t see someone being upset about it. There is NOTHING oceanic about it on my skin and the marketing around it has been screwed up imo. Underwhelming performance sadly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2011988"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2011988#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2011280" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2011280" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bungulburt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1848043"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1848043.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bungulburt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Uomo-Born-in-Roma-55963.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55963.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Uomo Born in Roma"title="Valentino Uomo Born in Roma"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2011280ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2011280" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1848043">bungulburt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-26">12/26/23 13:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really thought I would like this more. It does have a slight "oceanic" way about it, but for the most part I get a heavy syrupy sweetness from some kind of cherry or plum note in the beginning. It's kind of hard to describe. <br />
<br />
It's like the blue water they fill up porta-potties with. But in a good way. Or at least an okay way. <br />
<br />
Not going to be in my summer rotation. Will probably trade eventually.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2011280"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2011280#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2008481" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2008481" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vmaster"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/710180"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.710180.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vmaster" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Balenciaga/Ho-Hang-Club-14435.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14435.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ho Hang Club"title="Ho Hang Club"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2008481ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2008481" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/710180">Vmaster</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-22">12/22/23 23:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Luna Rossa Ocean EdT is definitely a compliment getter and can be worn for most occasions. As it is not a projection beast, it would be perfect for cuddling with that special someone without choking them out. <br />
<br />
This can be best worn during the warmer months of the year, but if you over-spray a little it can shine during the cold Winter months.<br />
<br />
Notes according to the Prada website:<br />
Top notes: Bergamot, Pink Pepper, Artemisia.<br />
Heart Notes: Iris Notes, Lavender, Saffron Accord.<br />
Base Notes: Vetiver, Musks, Patchouli.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2008481"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2008481#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2005305" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2000206" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SmoothieOperator"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1905905"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SmoothieOperator" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2000206ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2000206" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1905905">SmoothieOperator</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-13">12/13/23 09:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the type of fragrance I would be raving about if it was an under-the-radar, $25 release from Guess, because it's very 'delicious'. It just doesn't have the complexity nor performance for me to recommend it at $100.<br />
<br />
- You need to wear too much of it when you leave the house for it to still be there later. That's why performance is important; not having to shower in it. Smell like an offensive bag of gummy bears for 3 hours, then nothing. <br />
<br />
- Apparently there's a stringer EDP, but with completely different notes? Another reason to invest in a different direction.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="2000206"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=2000206#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1997287" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Packs a punch and stays consistent for hours. I got lots of the aromatic Artemis not a touch of caramel nevertheless a super affordable buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1990215"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1990215#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1988497" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1988497" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stevchonni"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/259404"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="stevchonni" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1988497ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1988497" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/259404">stevchonni</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-29">11/29/23 16:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got really nice compliments while wearing it today at work. Some of them were couple of hours after applying it and from the distance, so I guess it projects well. <br />
After more than 10 hours on my neck and hair, I could still smell the beautiful lavendery and clean drydown.<br />
To me, it is more refined and luxurious type of Bleu de Chanel scents but it does not scream that chemical shower gel freshness.<br />
Instead, this is a bit soapy, clean, fresh and well balanced smell that you will certainly enjoy because nobody makes better this type of scents than Prada.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1980306" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kustomeyez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1528791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kustomeyez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Elixir-71708.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71708.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1 Million Elixir"title="1 Million Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1980306ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1980306" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528791">Kustomeyez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-19">11/19/23 11:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>…….I’m on my 2nd bottle got the largest one this time, first one lasted me about a year or so.  I love this stuff. I have over 300 frags in my collection, a lot of things smell quite similar to allot of other things in redundancy,… but Not this one.  This one is all on its own unique. People say it smells generic, smells like shower gel , smells underwhelming, blah blah blah,.. It smells great and I can not even compare it to anything else. Don’t trust anyone but yourself, and perhaps your partner,.. get a sample and see for yourself.  First few times I wore ocean I felt as if I need to use more in my application, so I did just that, went to the hardware store on my way to work and some random guy looked straight at me and said ,… woah Dude ,,, WaaaY too much cologne,… I looked him dead in the eyes and said 👌 Perfect ,… mission accomplished &amp; walked away 🤷🏼♂️🤣😆  haters gonna hate and I personally Do Not Care 😎 this ocean is a 10/10 reminds me of the way my dad smelled after work, he worked in a grocery store and always had his shirts and suits dry cleaned, never smoked, he never really wore cologne either, maybe a splash of Stetson after shaving but that was it, he always came home smelling fresh almost somehow crisp and certainly clean. I always associated the smell with laundry detergent and that powdery soft smelling scented tissues inside a new cardboard box. I know it sounds strange, but oddly satisfying, 🤷🏼♂️ I love it . U might too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1980306"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1980306#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1979531" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The sweetness almost gives me pistachio ice cream vibe. Like eating pistachio ice cream on the boardwalk at the end of summer when it’s a little chilly, right before it turns to fall. Also feels clean like laundry detergent or dryer sheets. I’m a woman and usually go for super feminine stuff, but I would totally wear this myself, very unisex and easy to wear in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1971103" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="federico.rev"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242737"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="federico.rev" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1971103ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1971103" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242737">federico.rev</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-07">11/07/23 13:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the worst fragrances ever smelled.<br />
Here, in addition to being the usual pot of aromachemicals mess from designer modern “perfumery” where the art is extinct, the smell it gives off is comparable to bleach.<br />
Repugnant</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1971103"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1971103#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1967181" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1954639" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="51notes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1037659"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="51notes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Gentleman-Society-78639.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78639.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentleman Society"title="Gentleman Society"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1954639ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1954639" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1037659">51notes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-17">10/17/23 21:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love at first sniff. Fresh, spicy, blue, uplifting, just sweet enough, and not powdery like everything else on the dry down. Has enough depth for cold weather but clean enough for warmer as well. Can be used for anything anytime, great for office. I'm glad I got the 5oz because I reach for it a lot. Blind buy worthy, only fragrance worthy. Lasts long enough, double layer and it gets you through the day with plenty of sillage and just enough projection. Feel confident knowing you'll smell great to everyone but just different enough.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1954639"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1954639#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1950993" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The opening on this is heavenly. <br />
<br />
I dont think the longevity and projection on this is bad- the atomizer is just weak and mediocre. Doesnt spray a lot. So I just spray 2x on each application location.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1950993"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1950993#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1942141" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Like one of those hubba bubba. Not that long lasting (around 3h) but this is good for situations like work/school because it isn't that attacking.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1932854"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1932854#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1929346" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1929346" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Devilicious94"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1139826"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1139826.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Devilicious94" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1929346ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1929346" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1139826">Devilicious94</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-16">09/16/23 08:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Prefer this over Prada L'homme/L'eau, still has the prada cleanliness with the iris and lavender, not too heavy but added depth with the musk and caramel sweetness. I wished they added salty notes for a fresh salted caramel vibe to really push that ocean name but nevertheless still a modest blue fragrance if you are looking for something in-between fresh and sweet. Expectedly weak performance on this style of fragrance, the EDP version takes a drastic turn with even less notes for an ocean vibe and no iris. <br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1929346"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1929346#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1925326" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I said "this is it? This is what all the hype is about?" It smelled like a typical blue fragrance and the performance was trash. Then I went outside and only sprayed it on my skin. It lasted quite a while, but the sillage was very intimate.
