padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723781">Flowerfruit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-18">05/18/23 09:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As a female, I find this to be one of the sexiest colognes on a man, especially in the summertime.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1836121"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1836121#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1836003" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1836003" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="relw"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1638832"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="relw" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1836003ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1836003" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1638832">relw</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-18">05/18/23 06:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells really synthetic</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1836003"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1836003#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1829156" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1829156" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ISiCK"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1672379"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ISiCK" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1829156ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1829156" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1672379">ISiCK</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-09">05/09/23 23:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Prada's Luna Rossa Ocean is an average scent. Admittedly, its not my go-to fragrance among my collection but it does stand out as slightly different. The packaging of this product is elegant and will look great on any collector's shelf. <br />
<br />
At first spray, you get a fresh clean scent that eventually sweetens. With that in regard, "Ocean" is quite confusing as it gives off the idea that this will smell like an aquatic scent similar to the likes of Dolce's Light Blue or even Nautica Voyage. The smell is still "nice" however, but nice is not what I had expected from Prada. <br />
<br />
This cologne is average and not worth the $90+ asking price. There are much better products to choose at the price range. <br />
<br />
I received this product as a free sample from Influenster.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1829156"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1829156#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1828130" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1828130" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="boozya"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445080"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="boozya" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1828130ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1828130" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445080">boozya</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-08">05/08/23 18:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yeah, I don't get this one. Not that other Luna Rossa flankers were particularly unique or original, but at least the quality and character was there. Ocean is decidedly on the lower end of the copycat spectrum, something you'd expect from Bath and Body Works or Axe, just this nondescript bland forgettable "fresh" deodorant smell that is like a million others. <br />
The bottle is nice though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1828130"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1828130#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1827666" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1827666" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nafsir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1466379"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1466379.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nafsir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Homme-Ideal-Extreme-60284.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60284.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Homme Idéal Extrême"title="L'Homme Idéal Extrême"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1827666ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1827666" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1466379">Nafsir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-08">05/08/23 06:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Scent: 9/10<br />
Sillage: 7/10<br />
Longevity: 6/10<br />
Value: 7/10<br />
<br />
Overall: 7/10<br />
<br />
Would I recommend it?<br />
<br />
Yes, It has a lovely fresh opening, probably one of my favourite openings however, the performance isn't the best it lasts 1.5h best case and then it becomes a skin scent for around 3-4 hours, In my case I think its best to spray this on both your skin and clothes this way it has much better longevity however, it's much more suited for skin rather than clothes though. Dry-off isn't particularly bad either, it performs best during hot weather so summer is the best time to wear this, you could pull it off during spring as well. I recommend getting EDP rather than EDT as it performs much better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1827666"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1827666#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1827020" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1827020" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="enro"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1314681"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="enro" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Extreme-18882.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18882.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna Rossa Extreme"title="Luna Rossa Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1827020ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1827020" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1314681">enro</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-07">05/07/23 09:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great, fresh opening, but the dry down turns sour, synthetic and off-putting on my skin. It’s too bad, this could’ve been a nice summer scent. <br />
<br />
Very cool bottle design though.<br />
<br />
I bought this and the new EDP version. I’m returning the EDT and keeping the EDP.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1827020"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1827020#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1820175" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1820175" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cutfreeordie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729221"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1729221.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cutfreeordie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1820175ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1820175" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729221">Cutfreeordie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-28">04/28/23 13:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Perhaps I’m the only one, but I get a Cool Water vibe from this. Almost like this could have been a flanker in an alternate universe. <br />
<br />
Overall it’s fine. Nothing to be amazed by, but nothing to scoff at either. I find it to be best suited for mid to late 20s and up, and business friendly. Like a few others have stated, it feels a bit more rain aquatic than oceanic to my nose.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1820175"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1820175#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="68753" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>

<br />

align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1389613"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1389613#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1405799" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1405799" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gogiciano"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224835"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1224835.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gogiciano" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1405799ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1405799" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224835">Gogiciano</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-07">09/07/21 01:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What is wrong with your noses, people? <br />
<br />
It's a fresh and clean scent with a perfect caramel undertone right from the start. People saying this isn't unique are crazy. I have a big collection and tested a lot of fragrances, but never smelled something like this. <br />
<br />
I sprayed this in the store and the first girl I talked to complimented me on how good I smelled. This will be a real compliment getter for sure. Great for Fall. <br />
<br />
Don't sleep on it and don't believe those negative reviews. Go smell it for yourself and make up your own mind. <br />
<br />
And I don't know why people comparing this with Dylan Blue. Maybe because it's a blue scent. But they smell so different. And this Prada is superior to Dylan Blue in every possible way.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1405799"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1405799#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1397738" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1397738" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kalilax"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/8693"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.8693.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kalilax" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-Sport-Superleggera-95753.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95753.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme Sport Superleggera"title="Allure Homme Sport Superleggera"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1397738ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1397738" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/8693">kalilax</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-23">08/23/21 21:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Been smelling this right next to BDC EDT: Very similar drydowns, but they each take their own, very interesting journey there. Since that journey is short-lived anyway, I don't think you'd need both in your collection, at least not at full price. <br />
<br />
To my nose, Ocean has a tad of sweetness/warmness about it that probably lands it closer to the latest fad in the modern frag world. That warmness also gives Ocean a more youthful, playful vibe. Sillage (~1h) and longevity (~6h) are above the current average. I imagine all of these features would make Ocean a most amazing pick for a 30-something-year-old on a date. <br />
<br />
To be honest, this is probably the next best thing you can ever find post BDC, but then again, it's really unfair to compare every fragrance to an all-time masterpiece. This is one composition that would be adored if it wasn't overshadowed by Bleu (and I'm very much guilty of making that comparison), but hey, such is life...<br />
<br />
Update: Wearing this for a couple of days now, I think the idea behind the name must have been Ocean deep, not Ocean blue. In a really stunning way, the scent fosters this sense of depth and serenity... Curious if others may pick up the same sensation.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1397738"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1397738#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1396647" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1396647" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jsn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369512"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1369512.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jsn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1396647ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1396647" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369512">jsn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-21">08/21/21 20:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Recently went for an in store pick up of another fragrance I ordered online. Tried this on a card &amp; initially I wasn’t really impressed. I mentioned that I probably needed to try it on instead of smelling the card &amp; the SA said go ahead. So I threw on 4 sprays, grabbed my bottle I originally went in for &amp; headed out the door. This is when I started to change my tune. The drive home I’m kinda digging this stuff more &amp; more. <br />
<br />
To me this is basically Prada L’Homme with a marine/aquatic flair. It comes together fantastic though. It leans a little close to L’Homme to me because it has that same fresh clean powder feel when it starts to dry down which I didn’t pick up on the card earlier. It could be a flanker for the L’Homme line rather than Luna Rossa, but let’s not get into semantics.<br />
<br />
I tried talking myself out of buying this due to the fact I already have L’Homme &amp; other aquatic scents that will fill my need &amp; I don’t really need this. Well as the day went on &amp; I continued to smell it on me I’ve decided I will buy it. It’s just a really good, simple, &amp; well put together scent.<br />
<br />
Edit: Bought it. 😎<br />
<br />
-The End</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1396647"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1396647#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1391846" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1391846" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SupermanEcstacy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1344701"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SupermanEcstacy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1391846ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1391846" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1344701">SupermanEcstacy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-13">08/13/21 16:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Again, people hate what they don't understand. This fragrance is going to get hyped and loved in a year, so don't jump the gun with it. It's an extraordinary fragrance, very soapy, as Prada are well known for, slight sweetness and oceanic wateriness. Gives me a busy city vibe while it's raining and you rush into a coffee shop for some brew. Lovely fragrance, definitely give it a try.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1391846"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1391846#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="68753" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1801760" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Brother Wolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1163370"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1163370.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Brother Wolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/MYSLF-Eau-de-Parfum-84094.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84094.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="MYSLF Eau de Parfum"title="MYSLF Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1801760ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1801760" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1163370">Brother Wolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-06">04/06/23 01:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh, NO!!! Please, forgive me folks, but I am very disappointed and quite shocked with this fragrance and the fact that it was created by Prada. I’m not one to complain much, but I have to be truthful.  I own most of the Prada scents for men and I must say that I am more than impressed with all of them. However, I had such high hopes for this one and I got a pie in the face. I don’t want to spoil or taint the experience for any of you who are thinking of trying this one, so I won’t go into all of the heavy details. However, I WILL say that I don’t catch the “ocean” vibe and the musk note in the dry down is definitely a deal breaker for me. It’s a very interesting and quite pleasant fragrance up until then. To each his own though. You may actually love it, but get a sample and wait for the dry down before placing your money on the counter. <br />
<br />
BEWARE: Do not get too excited about this fragrance like I did, unless you like the feeling of a pie smacking you across your mugshot. Sample it first on your skin, clothing, etc., before going all in. You’ve been warned.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1801760"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1801760#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1461729" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1428279" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aus11n"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1336897"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1336897.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aus11n" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1428279ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1428279" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1428279"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1428279#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1424496" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1424496" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="musicformer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1398694"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1398694.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="musicformer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1424496ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1424496" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1398694">musicformer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-08">10/08/21 05:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tested and don't like the whole line, but this is by far the worst. The performance is weak and it also has nothing from an "ocean". It's just a sinple boring and weak "sugar water".<br />
<br />
EDIT:<br />
By the way, this has nothing from Dylan Blue! I often wear Dylan Blue and it smells different and better and lasts much longer. My current Dylan Blue Batch is from 2020 and this kills that Ocean here in almost every aspect.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68753"comment_id="1424496"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html?ccid=1424496#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="68753" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="search-reviews"><search-perfume-reviews :perfume_id="68753":random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]"></search-perfume-reviews></div></div><foundation-tabs></foundation-tabs></reviews-wrapper></div><perfume-shortcut-menu :perfume_id="68753" when-hidden="#toptop"></perfume-shortcut-menu><initialize-status-data></initialize-status-data><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_footer -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __728x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_footer" v-pre>
</div></div></div>
            </div>

            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com") });
                if (lang == 'DE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.de").replace(/designers/, "Designer").replace(/perfume/, "Parfum") });
                if (lang == 'ES') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.es").replace(/designers/, "disenador") });
                if (lang == 'FR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.fr").replace(/designers/, "designer").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'CS') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.cz").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'IT') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.it").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'RU') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ru") });
                if (lang == 'PL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.pl").replace(/designers/, "marki").replace(/perfume/, "perfumy") });
                if (lang == 'PT') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com.br").replace(/designers/, "desenhista") });
                if (lang == 'EL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.gr").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'ZH') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.asia").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'NL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.nl").replace(/designers/, "ontwerper").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'SR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.punmiris.com").replace(/designers/, "dizajner").replace(/perfume/, "parfem") });
                if (lang == 'RO') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ro").replace(/designers/, "creatori").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'AR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragranticarabia.com").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'UK') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ua").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'MN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.mn").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'HE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.co.il").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgH0e5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
